content.description: During a session with a psychologist, 22-year-old Barry reports that he has been seeing things that others cannot see. At one point, he remarks that “his sweatshirt has a headache.”
content.question: Which of the following diagnoses is most consistent with Barry’s symptoms?

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
